nobasd.description: Indicates that no bias correction was performed on the climate data (e.g. ocean data).

localbc.description: Refers to local data from weather stations used for the bias-correction in e.g. the forest sector.

w5e5.description: Refers to W5E5 data used for the bias-correction globally on a 0.5° grid.

co2.description: For all experiments other than the sensitivity experiments for which 2005co2 is explicitly written.

hyytiala.title: Hyytiälä
hyytiala.comment: Note that an experimental plot of pine contains a lot of data while footprint of flux tower is larger. Please note that the deciduous admixtures only appear in the data at a later stage and hence do not need to be simulated. Only simulate pine and spruce (no hard-woods) and regenerate as pure pine stand

peitz.title: Peitz
peitz.comment: Managed using a weak thinning from below.

kroof.comment: Unmanaged/ thinning from below in past 20 years for all species.

firr.title: Full irrigation
firr.description: Full irrigation, i.e. until the soil is saturated.

noirr.title: No irrigation (rainfed land)
noirr.description: No irrigation. Both irrigation variations are required for the agro-economic models.

cropland_total.comment: total cropland in a grid cell

cropland_rainfed.comment: all of the rainfed cropland in a grid cell

cropland_irrigated.comment: all of the irrigated cropland in a grid cell

pastures.comment: share of pastures, both  managed or rangeland, in a grid cell

c3ann_rainfed.comment: share of rainfed C3 annual crops in a grid cell

c3ann_irrigated.comment: share of irrigated C3 annual crops in a grid cell

c3per_rainfed.comment: share of rainfed C3 perennial crops in a grid cell, these have not been further downscaled from the "5 crops" data

c3per_irrigated.comment: share of irrigated C3 perennial crops in a grid cell, these have not been further downscaled from the "5 crops" data

c3nfx_rainfed.comment: share of rainfed C3 nitrogen-fixing crops in a grid cell

c3nfx_irrigated.comment: share of irrigated C3 nitrogen-fixing crops in a grid cell

c4ann_rainfed.comment: share of rainfed C4 annual crops in a grid cell

c4ann_irrigated.comment: share of irrigated C4 annual crops in a grid cell

c4per_rainfed.comment: share of rainfed C4 perennial crops in a grid cell, currently this covers only sugarcane

c4per_irrigated.comment: share of irrigated C4  perennial crops in a grid cell, currently this covers only sugarcane

maize_rainfed.comment: share of rainfed maize in a grid cell

maize_irrigated.comment: share of irrigated maize in a grid cell

oil_crops_groundnut_rainfed.comment: share of rainfed oil crops (groundnut) in a grid cell

oil_crops_groundnut_irrigated.comment: share of irrigated oil crops (groundnut) in a grid cell

oil_crops_rapeseed_rainfed.comment: share of rainfed oil crops (groundnut) in a grid cel

oil_crops_rapeseed_irrigated.comment: share of irrigated oil crops (groundnut) in a grid cell

oil_crops_soybean_rainfed.comment: share of rainfed oil crops (soybean) in a grid cell

oil_crops_soybean_irrigated.comment: share of irrigated oil crops (soybean) in a grid cell

oil_crops_sunflower_rainfed.comment: share of rainfed oil crops (sunflower) in a grid cell

oil_crops_sunflower_irrigated.comment: share of irrigated oil crops (sunflower) in a grid cell

pulses_rainfed.comment: share of rainfed pulses in a grid cell

pulses_irrigated.comment: share of irrigated pulses in a grid cell

temperate_cereals_rainfed.comment: share of rainfed temperate cereals in a grid cell

temperate_cereals_irrigated.comment: share of irrigated temperate cereals in a grid cell

temperate_roots_rainfed.comment: share of rainfed temperate roots in a grid cell

temperate_roots_irrigated.comment: share of  irrigated temperate roots in a grid cell

tropical_cereals_rainfed.comment: share of rainfed tropical cereals in a grid cell

tropical_cereals_irrigated.comment: share of irrigated in tropical cereals a grid cell

tropical_roots_rainfed.comment: share of rainfed tropical roots in a grid cell

tropical_roots_irrigated.comment: share of irrigated tropical roots in a grid cell

others_c3ann_rainfed.comment: share of rainfed C3 annual crops not covered by the above in a grid cell

others_c3ann_irrigated.comment: share of irrigated  rainfed C3 annual crops not covered by the above in a grid cell

others_c3nfx_rainfed.comment: share of rainfed C3 N-fixing crops not covered by the above in a grid cell

others_c3nfx_irrigated.comment: share of irrigated C3 N-fixing crops not covered by the above in a grid cell

managed_pastures.comment: share of managed pastures in a grid cell

rangeland.comment: share of rangeland in a grid cell

urbanareas.comment: share of urban areas in a grid cell

fertl_c3ann.comment: deposition of N through fertilizer on cropland with C3 annual crops

fertl_c3per.comment: deposition of N through fertilizer on cropland with C3 perennial crops

fertl_c3nfx.comment: deposition of N through fertilizer on cropland with C3 N-fixing crops

fertl_c4ann.comment: deposition of N through fertilizer on cropland with C4 annual crops

fertl_c4per.comment: deposition of N through fertilizer on cropland with C4 perennial crops

histsoc.description: Varying historical land use, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input.

2015soc.description: Fixed year-2015 land use, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input.

nosoc.description: No direct human influences except for varying land use changes up to 2015.

qtot.title: Runoff
qtot.comment: Total runoff leaving the land portion of the grid cell

qs.title: Surface runoff
qs.comment: The total surface runoff leaving the land portion of the grid cell.

qsb.title: Subsurface runoff
qsb.comment: Sum of water that flows out from subsurface layer(s) including the groundwater layer (if present). Equals qg in case of a groundwater layer below only one soil layer.

qr.title: Groundwater recharge
qr.comment: Water that percolates through the soil layer(s) into the groundwater layer. In case seepage is simulated but no groundwater layer is present, report seepage as qr and qg.

qg.title: Groundwater runoff
qg.comment: Water that leaves the groundwater layer. In case seepage is simulated but no groundwater layer is present, report seepage as qr and qg.

maxdis.title: Monthly maximum of daily discharge
maxdis.comment: Optional variable – please report if daily discharge data is not reported.

mindis.title: Monthly minimum of daily discharge
mindis.comment: Optional variable – please report if daily discharge data is not reported.

evap.title: Evapotranspiration

resolution.water_regional: average for basin until gauge location

evap.comment: Sum of transpiration, evaporation, interception and sublimation.

potevap.title: Potential Evapotranspiration

resolution.water_regional: average for basin until gauge location

potevap.comment: As Evap, but with all resistances set to zero, except the aerodynamic resistance.

soilmoist.title: Soil moisture for each layer
soilmoist.comment: If possible, please provide soil moisture for all depth layers (i.e. 3D-field), and indicate depth in m. Otherwise, provide soil moisture of entire column.

rootmoist.title: Soil moisture, root zone
rootmoist.comment: Total simulated soil moisture available for evapotranspiration. If simulated by the model. Please indicate the depth of the root zone for each vegetation type in your model. If depth varies over time or space

soilmoistfroz.title: Frozen soil moisture for each layer
soilmoistfroz.comment: Please provide soil moisture for all depth levels and indicate depth in m. Please provide for purposes of permafrost sector.

tsl.title: Temperature of Soil
tsl.comment: Temperature of each soil layer. Reported as "missing" for grid cells occupied entirely by "sea".

snd.title: Snow depth
snd.comment: Grid cell mean depth of snowpack.

swe.title: Snow water equivalent
swe.comment: Total water mass of the snowpack (liquid or frozen) averaged over grid cell.

tws.title: Total water storage
tws.comment: Mean monthly water storage in all compartments. Please indicate in the netcdf metadata which storage compartments are considered.

canopystor.title: Canopy water storage
canopystor.comment: Mean monthly water storage in the canopy.

glacierstor.title: Glacier storage
glacierstor.comment: Mean monthly water storage in glaciers.

groundwstor.title: Groundwater storage
groundwstor.comment: Mean monthly water storage in groundwater layer.

lakestor.title: Lake storage
lakestor.comment: Mean monthly water storage in lakes (except reservoirs).

wetlandstor.title: Wetland storage
wetlandstor.comment: Mean monthly water storage in wetlands.

reservoirstor.title: Reservoir storage
reservoirstor.comment: Mean monthly water storage in reservoirs.

riverstor.title: Reservoir storage
riverstor.comment: Mean monthly water storage in rivers.

triver.title: River temperature
triver.comment: Mean monthly water temperature in river (representative of the average temperature across the channel volume).

rainf.title: Rainfall
rainf.comment: Required for test purposes only. If you need to reduce output data volumes, please provide these variables only once, with the first (test) data set you submit, e.g. for the first decade of each experiment. NOTE: rainf + snowf = total precipitation

snowf.title: Snowfall
snowf.comment: Required for test purposes only. If you need to reduce output data volumes, please provide these variables only once, with the first (test) data set you submit, e.g. for the first decade of each experiment. NOTE: rainf + snowf = total precipitation

pirrww.title: Irrigation water withdrawal (assuming unlimited water supply)
pirrww.comment: Irrigation water withdrawn in case of optimal irrigation (in addition to rainfall), assuming no losses in conveyance and application.

airrww.title: Actual irrigation water withdrawal
airrww.comment: Irrigation water withdrawal, taking water availability into account; please provide if computed.

pirruse.title: Potential irrigation water consumption
pirruse.comment: Portion of withdrawal that is evapo-transpired, assuming unlimited water supply.

airruse.title: Actual irrigation water consumption
airruse.comment: Portion of withdrawal that is evapo-transpired, taking water availability into account; if computed.

airrusegreen.title: Actual green water consumption on irrigated cropland
airrusegreen.comment: Actual evapotranspiration from rainwater over irrigated cropland; if computed.

pirrusegreen.title: Potential green water consumption on irrigated cropland
pirrusegreen.comment: Potential evapotranspiration from rainwater over irrigated cropland; if computed and different from AIrrUseGreen.

arainfusegreen.title: Actual green water consumption on rainfed cropland
arainfusegreen.comment: Actual evapotranspiration from rainwater over rainfed cropland; if computed.

atotuse.title: Total (all sectors) actual water consumption
atotuse.comment: Sum of actual water consumption from all sectors. Please indicate in metadata which sectors are included.

ptotww.title: Total (all sectors) potential water withdrawal
ptotww.comment: Sum of potential (i.e. assuming unlimited water supply) water withdrawal from all sectors. Please indicate in metadata which sectors are included.

ptotuse.title: Total (all sectors) potential water consumption
ptotuse.comment: Sum of potential (i.e. assuming unlimited water supply) water consumption from all sectors. Please indicate in metadata which sectors are included.

soil.title: Soil types
soil.comment: Soil types or texture classes as used by your model. Please include a description of each type or class, especially if these are different from the standard HSWD and GSWP3 soil types. Please also include a description of the parameters and values associated with these soil types (parameter values could be submitted as spatial fields where appropriate).

yield.title: Crop yields
yield.unit: dry matter (t ha-1 per growing season)
yield.comment: Crop-specific: Yield may be identical to above-ground biomass (biom) if the entire plant is harvested, e.g. for bioenergy production.

aet.title: Actual evapotranspiration
aet.comment: Portion of all water (including rain) that is evapo-transpired, the water amount should be accumulated over the entire growing period (not the calendar year)

initr.title: Nitrogen application rate
initr.comment: Total nitrogen application rate. If organic and inorganic amendments are applied, rate should be reported as effective inorganic nitrogen input (ignoring residues).

biom.title: Above ground biomass (dry matter)
biom.comment: The whole plant biomass above ground.

sco2.title: Soil carbon emissions
sco2.comment: Ideally should be modeled with realistic land-use history and initial carbon pools. Subject to extra study.

sn2o.title: Nitrous oxide emissions
sn2o.comment: Ideally should be modeled with realistic land-use history and initial carbon pools. Subject to extra study.

tnup.title: Total N uptake (total growing season sum)

tnin.title: Total N inputs (total growing season sum)

tnloss.title: Total N losses (total growing season sum)

amphibianprob.title: Amphibian species probability of occurrence
amphibianprob.comment: Results from individual SDMs assuming no dispersal.

birdprob.title: Terrestrial bird species probability of occurrence
birdprob.comment: Results from individual SDMs assuming no dispersal.

mammalprob.title: Terrestrial mammal species probability of occurrence
mammalprob.comment: Results from individual SDMs assuming no dispersal.

amphibiansumprob.title: Amphibian summed probability of occurrence
amphibiansumprob.unit: Summed probability of occurrence per cell
amphibiansumprob.comment: Aggregated results from individual SDMs assuming no dispersal.

birdsumprob.title: Terrestrial bird summed probability of occurrence
birdsumprob.unit: Summed probability of occurrence per cell
birdsumprob.comment: Aggregated results from individual SDMs assuming no dispersal.

mammalsumprob.title: Terrestrial mammal summed probability of occurrence
mammalsumprob.unit: Summed probability of occurrence per cell
mammalsumprob.comment: Aggregated results from individual SDMs assuming no dispersal.

endamphibiansumprob.title: Summed probability of endemic amphibian species
endamphibiansumprob.unit: Summed probability of occurrence per cell
endamphibiansumprob.comment: Aggregated results from individual SDMs assuming no dispersal.

endbirdsumprob.title: Summed probability of endemic terrestrial bird species
endbirdsumprob.unit: Summed probability of occurrence per cell
endbirdsumprob.comment: Aggregated results from individual SDMs assuming no dispersal.

endmammalsumprob.title: Summed probability of endemic terrestrial mammal species
endmammalsumprob.unit: Summed probability of occurrence per cell
endmammalsumprob.comment: Aggregated results from individual SDMs assuming no dispersal.

thramphibiansumprob.title: Summed probability of threatened amphibian species
thramphibiansumprob.unit: Summed probability of occurrence per cell
thramphibiansumprob.comment: Aggregated results from individual SDMs assuming no dispersal.

thrbirdsumprob.title: Summed probability of threatened terrestrial bird species
thrbirdsumprob.unit: Summed probability of occurrence per cell
thrbirdsumprob.comment: Aggregated results from individual SDMs assuming no dispersal.

thrmammalsumprob.title: Summed probability of threatened terrestrial mammal species
thrmammalsumprob.unit: Summed probability of occurrence per cell
thrmammalsumprob.comment: Aggregated results from individual SDMs assuming no dispersal.

amphibiansr.title: Amphibian species richness
amphibiansr.unit: Estimated number of species (species richness) per cell

birdsr.title: Terrestrial bird species richness
birdsr.unit: Estimated number of species (species richness) per cell

mammalsr.title: Terrestrial mammal species richness
mammalsr.unit: Estimated number of species (species richness) per cell

comment.biomes: Grid cell total is essential. Per PFT information is desirable.
comment.permafrost: Grid cell total is essential. Per PFT information is desirable.

cvegag.title: Carbon Mass in aboveground vegetation biomass

comment.biomes: Grid cell total is essential. Per PFT information is desirable.
comment.permafrost: Grid cell total is essential. Per PFT information is desirable.

cvegbg.title: Carbon Mass in belowground vegetation biomass

comment.biomes: Grid cell total is essential. Per PFT information is desirable.
comment.permafrost: Grid cell total is essential. Per PFT information is desirable.

comment.biomes: Grid cell total is essential. Per PFT information is desirable. Info for each individual pool.
comment.forestry: As kg carbon*m-2, Info for each individual pool.
comment.permafrost: Grid cell total is essential. Per PFT information is desirable. Info for each individual pool.

comment.biomes: Grid cell total is essential. Per PFT information is desirable. Info for each individual pool.
comment.forestry: As kg carbon*m-2, Info for each individual soil layer.
comment.permafrost: Grid cell total is essential. Per PFT information is desirable. Info for each individual pool.

gpp.title: Carbon Mass Flux out of Atmosphere due to Gross Primary Production on Land

ra.title: Carbon Mass Flux into Atmosphere due to Autotrophic (Plant) Respiration on Land

npp.title: Carbon Mass Flux out of Atmosphere due to Net Primary Production on Land

npplandleaf.title: Net Primary Production on Land allocated to leaf biomass

npplandroot.title: Net Primary Production on Land allocated to fine root biomass

nppabovegroundwood.title: Net Primary Production on Land allocated to above ground wood biomass

nppbelowgroundwood.title: Net Primary Production on Land allocated to below ground wood biomass

rh.title: Carbon Mass Flux into Atmosphere due to Heterotrophic Respiration on Land

fireint.title: Carbon Mass Flux into Atmosphere due to CO2 Emission from Fire

firefrac.title: Fraction of cell burnt by fire
firefrac.comment: Burnt area fraction: single value for each scenario corresponding to year 2100

ecoatmflux.title: Carbon Mass Flux out of Atmosphere due to Net Biospheric Production on Land
ecoatmflux.comment: This is the net mass flux of carbon between land and atmosphere calculated as photosynthesis MINUS the sum of plant and soil respiration, carbonfluxes from fire, harvest, grazing and land use change. Positive flux is into the land.

fapar.title: Fraction of absorbed photosynthetically active radiation

comment.water_global: If used by, or computed by the model.
comment.water_regional: If used by, or computed by the model.

pft.title: Plant Functional Type Grid Fraction
pft.comment: The categories may differ from model to model, depending on their PFT definitions. This may include natural PFTs, anthropogenic PFTs, bare soil, lakes, urban areas, etc. Sum of all should equal the fraction of the grid cell that is land.

intercep.title: Evaporation from Canopy (interception)
intercep.comment: The canopy evaporation+sublimation (if present in model).

burntarea.title: Burnt Area Fraction
burntarea.comment: Fraction of entire grid cell that is covered by burnt vegetation.

hei.title: Stand Height
hei.comment: For models including natural regeneration this variable may not make sense, please report domhei.

domhei.title: Dominant Height
domhei.comment: Mean height of the 100 highest trees per hectare.

harv.title: Harvest by DBH-class
harv.comment: DBH class resolution: Either DBH classes or total

stemno.title: Remaining stem number after disturbance and management by dbh class
stemno.comment: DBH class resolution: Either DBH classes or total

age.title: Tree age by dbh class
age.comment: DBH class resolution: Either DBH classes or total

mortstemno.title: Removed stem numbers by size class by natural mortality

harvstemno.title: Removed stem numbers by size class by management

nppleaf.title: Net Primary Production allocated to leaf biomass

npproot.title: Net Primary Production allocated to fine root biomass

nppagwood.title: Net Primary Production allocated to above ground wood biomass

nppbgwood.title: Net Primary Production allocated to below ground wood biomass

strat.title: Thermal stratification
strat.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
strat.comment: 1 if lake grid cell is thermally stratified, 0 if lake grid cell is not thermally stratified

thermodepth.title: Depth of Thermocline
thermodepth.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
thermodepth.comment: Depth corresponding the maximum water density gradient

watertemp.title: Water temperature
watertemp.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
watertemp.comment: Depth resolution: Full Profile. Simulated water temperature. Layer averages and full profiles.

surftemp.title: Surface temperature
surftemp.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
surftemp.comment: Average of the upper layer in case not simulated directly.

bottemp.title: Bottom temperature
bottemp.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
bottemp.comment: Average of the lowest layer in case not simulated directly.

ice.title: Lake ice cover
ice.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
ice.comment: 1 if ice cover is present in lake grid cell, 0 if no ice cover is present in lake grid cell

lakeicefrac.title: Lake layer ice mass fraction
lakeicefrac.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
lakeicefrac.comment: Depth resolution: Mean epi. Fraction of mass of a given layer taken up by ice.

icethick.title: Ice thickness
icethick.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell

snowthick.title: Snow thickness
snowthick.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell

icetemp.title: Temperature at the ice upper surface
icetemp.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell

snowtemp.title: Temperature at the snow upper surface
snowtemp.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell

sensheatf.title: Sensible heat flux at the lake-atmosphere interface
sensheatf.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
sensheatf.comment: At the surface of snow, ice or water depending on the layer in contact with the atmosphere. Positive if upwards.

latentheatf.title: Latent heat flux at the lake-atmosphere interface
latentheatf.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
latentheatf.comment: At the surface of snow, ice or water depending on the layer in contact with the atmosphere. Positive if upwards.

momf.title: Momentum flux at the lake-atmosphere interface
momf.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
momf.comment: At the surface of snow, ice or water depending on the layer in contact with the atmosphere. Positive if upwards.

swup.title: Upward shortwave radiation flux at the lake-atmosphere interface
swup.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
swup.comment: At the surface of snow, ice or water depending on the layer in contact with the atmosphere. Positive if upwards. Not to be confused with net shortwave radiation.

lwup.title: Upward longwave radiation flux at the lake-atmosphere interface
lwup.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
lwup.comment: At the surface of snow, ice or water depending on the layer in contact with the atmosphere. Positive if upwards. Not to be confused with net longwave radiation.

lakeheatf.title: Downward heat flux at the lake-atmosphere interface
lakeheatf.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
lakeheatf.comment: At the surface of snow, ice or water depending on the layer in contact with the atmosphere. Positive if upwards. the residual term of the surface energy balance, i.e. the net amount of energy that enters the lake on daily time scale: lakeheatf = swdown - swup + lwdown - lwup - sensheatf - latenheatf (terms defined positive when directed upwards)

turbdiffheat.title: Turbulent diffusivity of heat
turbdiffheat.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
turbdiffheat.comment: Depth resolution: Either full profile, or mean epi and mean hypo. Only if computed by the model.

albedo.title: Surface albedo
albedo.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
albedo.comment: Albedo of the surface interacting with the atmosphere (water, ice or snow).

extcoeff.title: Light extinction coefficient
extcoeff.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
extcoeff.comment: Only to be reported for global models, local models should use extcoeff as input.

sedheatf.title: Sediment upward heat flux at the lake-sediment interface
sedheatf.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
sedheatf.comment: Positive if upwards. Only if computed by the model.

chl.title: Chlorophyll Concentration
chl.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
chl.comment: Depth resolution: Either full profile, or mean epi and mean hypo. Total water chlorophyll concentration – indicator of phytoplankton.

phytobio.title: Phytoplankton Functional group biomass
phytobio.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
phytobio.comment: Depth resolution: Either full profile, or mean epi and mean hypo. Different models will have different numbers of functional groups so that the reporting of these will vary by model.

zoobio.title: Phytoplankton Functional group biomass
zoobio.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
zoobio.comment: Depth resolution: Either full profile, or mean epi and mean hypo. Total simulated Zooplankton biomass.

tp.title: Total Phosphorus
tp.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
tp.comment: Depth resolution: Either full profile, or mean epi and mean hypo.

pp.title: Particulate Phosphorus
pp.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
pp.comment: Depth resolution: Either full profile, or mean epi and mean hypo.

tpd.title: Total Dissolved Phosphorus
tpd.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
tpd.comment: Depth resolution: Either full profile, or mean epi and mean hypo. Some models may also output data for soluble reactive phosphorus (SRP).

tn.title: Total Nitrogen
tn.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
tn.comment: Depth resolution: Either full profile, or mean epi and mean hypo.

pn.title: Particulate Nitrogen
pn.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
pn.comment: Depth resolution: Either full profile, or mean epi and mean hypo.

tdn.title: Total Dissolved Nitrogen
tdn.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
tdn.comment: Depth resolution: Either full profile, or mean epi and mean hypo. Some models may also output data for Nitrate (N02) nitrite (NO3) and ammonium (NH4).

do.title: Dissolved Oxygen
do.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
do.comment: Depth resolution: Either full profile, or mean epi and mean hypo.

doc.title: Dissolved Organic Carbon
doc.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
doc.comment: Depth resolution: Either full profile, or mean epi and mean hypo. Not always available.

si.title: Dissolved Silica
si.resolution: Representative lake associated with grid cell
si.comment: Depth resolution: Either full profile, or mean epi and mean hypo. Not always available.

tcb.title: TOTAL consumer biomass density
tcb.comment: all consumers (trophic level >1, vertebrates and invertebrates)

b10cm.title: Biomass density of consumers >10cm
b10cm.comment: if L infinity is >10 cm, include in >10 cm class

b30cm.title: Biomass density of consumers >30cm
b30cm.comment: if L infinity is >30 cm, include in >30 cm class

tc.title: TOTAL Catch (all commercial functional groups / size classes)
tc.comment: catch at sea (commercial landings plus discards, fish and invertebrates)

tla.title: TOTAL Landings (all commercial functional groups / size classes)
tla.comment: commercial landings (catch without discards, fish and invertebrates)

bcom.title: Biomass density of commercial species
bcom.comment: Discarded species not included (Fish and invertebrates)

blarge.title: Biomass density of large consumers >90cm and <100kg

bmed.title: Biomass density of medium consumers >30cm and <90cm

b.title: Biomass density (by functional group / size class)
b.comment: Provide name of each size class (<class>) and functional group (<group>) used, and provide a definition of each class/group.

c.title: Catch (by functional group / size class)
c.comment: Provide name of each size class (<class>) and functional group (<group>) used, and provide a definition of each class/group.

ancold.title: Number of deaths attributable to cold
ancold.comment: For ERF models, this occurs when temperature is below threshold (e.g., minimum mortality temperature (MMT)). Report 0 if temperature above threshold. Can have gender, age, etc. dimensions; see below.

anheat.title: Number of deaths attributable to heat
anheat.comment: Temperature above threshold (ERFs). Report 0 if temperature below threshold. Can have gender, age, etc. dimensions; see below.

btm.title: Baseline total mortality
btm.comment: To be reported as annual series of mean daily total mortality, or as a single number of mean daily mortality; to be used for computations of attributable fractions. Can have gender, age, etc. dimensions; see below.

pop.title: Population
pop.comment: Baseline population data should be provided for computations of mortality rates (i.e. deaths per total population). See Section ‎5.1.6. Can have gender, age, etc. dimensions; see below.

description.climate: no climate change before 1860, observed forcing afterwards; 1860 levels of CO2 until 1860 and based on observations afterwards
description.soc: 1860 levels of direct human influences until 1860, varying direct human influences according to observations afterwards

description.climate: no climate change before 1860, observed forcing afterwards; 1860 levels of CO2 until 1860 and based on observations afterward
description.soc: fixed 2015 levels of direct human influences for the entire time period

description.climate: de-trended observational climate forcing (counterfactual “no climate change” situation)
description.soc: 1860 levels of direct human influences until 1860, varying direct human influences according to observations afterwards

description.climate: de-trended observational climate forcing (counterfactual “no climate change” situation)
description.soc: 1860 levels of direct human influences until 1860, varying direct human influences according to observations afterwards

description.climate: de-trended observational climate forcing (counterfactual “no climate change” situation)
description.soc: fixed 2015 levels of direct human influences for the entire time period

description.climate: de-trended observational climate forcing (counterfactual “no climate change” situation)
description.soc: no direct human influences except for varying land use according to observations
varying management until 2015, then fixed at 2015 levels thereafter
fixed at 2015 levels for all periods
no direct human influences except for varying land use changes up to 2015
varying management until 2015, then fixed at 2015 levels thereafter
fixed at 2015 levels for all periods
no direct human influences except for varying land use changes up to 2015

description.climate: RCP2.6 climate, CO2 after 2015 fixed at 2015 levels
description.soc: fixed at 2015 levels for all periods
varying management until 2015, then fixed at 2015 levels thereafter
fixed at 2015 levels for all periods
no direct human influences except for varying land use changes up to 2015

default.title: Default
default.description: Model should use their individual “best representation” of the historical period with regard to sowing dates, harvesting dates, fertilizer application rates and crop varieties.

fullharm.title: Fully harmonized
fullharm.description: Simulations based on prescribed “present day” fertilization rates (available for download) and fixed planting and harvesting dates (also available for download). Modelers should have planting as closely as possible to these dates, but it may be admissible to use these dates as indicators for planting windows (depending on model specifics).

harmnon.title: Harmonized seasons with no N constraints
harmnon.description: For models with an explicit description of the nitrogen cycle: harmnon simulations should be run with nitrogen stress turned off completely or (if that’s not possible) with very high N application rates to make model results comparable between those GGCMs that have explicit N dynamics and those that do not. For models without the nitrogen cycle: harmnon and fullharm simulations are the same and do not need to be duplicated.

picontrol.description: Pre-industrial climate and 286ppm CO2 concentration. The climate data for the entire period (1661-2299) are unique – no (or little) recycling of data has taken place.

rcp26.description: Future climate and CO2 concentration from RCP2.6.

rcp85.description: Future climate and CO2 concentration from RCP8.5.

2015co2.description: CO2 concentration fixed at 2005 levels at 378.81ppm.

wfdei.title: WATCH-WFDEI
wfdei.comments: Combined forcing file (WFD 1901-1978, WFDEI 1979-2016) will be provided by ISIMIP. WFDEI precipitation and snowfall data are those corrected with GPCC. NOTE a discontinuity in the data exists at the transition from WATCH to WFDEI, and results must be interpreted with caution.

w5e5.title: GSWP3-W5E5
w5e5.comments: Combined forcing file (homogenized GSWP3 1901-1978, W5E5 1979-2016) will be provided by ISIMIP. To minimize discontinuities at the 1978/1979 transition, GSWP3 data were homogenized with W5E5 data using the ISIMIP2BASD v2.2 bias adjustment method.

ewembi.title: GSWP3-EWEMBI
ewembi.comments: Combined forcing file (homogenized GSWP3 1901-1978, EWEMBI 1979-2016) will be provided by ISIMIP. To minimize discontinuities at the 1978/1979 transition, GSWP3 data were homogenized with EWEMBI data using the ISIMIP2BASD v2.2 bias adjustment method.

gswp3.title: GSWP3
gswp3.comments: Based on dynamical downscaling. Further details on the global dynamical downscaling method are given in (Yoshimura & Kanamitsu, 2008) (Yoshimura & Kanamitsu, 2013).

princeton.title: PGMFD v.2
princeton.bias_target: CRU, SRB, TRMM, GPCP, WMO validated against GSWP2
